abstract: A P-521 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.

# P521.Signing.PublicKey

**Structure**

A P-521 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PublicKey
```

## Creating a key

- **init(rawRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from a collection of bytes.
- **init(compactRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from a compact representation of the key.
- **init(compressedRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from a compressed representation of the key.
- **init(derRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation.
- **init(pemRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from a Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation.
- **init(x963Representation:)**: Creates a P-521 public key for signing from an ANSI x9.63 representation.

## Representing the key

- **rawRepresentation**: A full representation of the public key.
- **compactRepresentation**: A compact representation of the public key.
- **compressedRepresentation**: A compressed representation of the public key.
- **derRepresentation**: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the public key.
- **pemRepresentation**: A Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the public key.
- **x963Representation**: An ANSI x9.63 representation of the public key.

## Verifying a signature

- **isValidSignature(_:for:)**: Verifies an elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature on a block of data over the P-521 elliptic curve.
- **isValidSignature(_:for:)**: Verifies an elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature on a digest over the P-521 elliptic curve.
- **P521.Signing.ECDSASignature**: A P-521 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature.

## Using keys

- **P521.Signing.PrivateKey**: A P-521 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
